feed.title: Brandon Y. Feng
feed.subtitle: I am a Postdoctoral Associate at [MIT CSAIL](https://www.csail.mit.edu/), working with [William T. Freeman](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_T._Freeman). I did my PhD in Computer Science at the [University of Maryland](https://www.cs.umd.edu/), advised by [Amitabh Varshney](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amitabh_Varshney). Before that, I was an undergrad at the [University of Virginia](https://www.virginia.edu/), majoring in Computer Science and Statistics.
